nodes.text: The Mark of Honor was a sculpture. It was awarded to a spacer in 1.5 ABY after they completed a task in an effort to become a hero, which displayed their honor and virtue. When combined with the other "Mark" sculptures, it formed a spherical shape.

A spacer, under the task of a strange Rodian hermit, gained this sculpture after showing true honor by assisting a married rancher couple in ensuring that a few pirates they had captured did now escape their ranch while the husband went out to find the authorities.
